title: Health and Well-being for Women in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the current fertility rate in Timor-Leste?

What was the maternal mortality ratio in Timor-Leste in 2017?
What percentage of pregnant women in Timor-Leste receive at least one antenatal care visit?
What percentage of births in Timor-Leste are attended by skilled health personnel?
According to a 2016 study, what percentage of women aged 15-49 in Timor-Leste have experienced physical or sexual violence by an intimate partner in their lifetime?
In which year did Timor-Leste pass the Law Against Domestic Violence?
What is the contraceptive prevalence rate in Timor-Leste according to the 2016 data?
What is the unmet need for family planning in Timor-Leste according to 2016 data?
What is the adolescent birth rate in Timor-Leste (births per 1,000 women aged 15-19) as of 2017?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a main cause of maternal mortality in Timor-Leste?
What is the name of the safe rooms provided in hospitals for domestic violence victims in Timor-Leste?
Which organization provides legal aid for domestic violence victims in Timor-Leste?
What does the Law Against Domestic Violence in Timor-Leste define domestic violence as?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a cultural barrier to family planning in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary purpose of antenatal care?
choices: To detect and manage pregnancy complications
questions.answer: To detect and manage pregnancy complications

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a challenge in accessing maternal health services in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of women who experienced violence in Timor-Leste sought help, according to the statistics provided?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a form of domestic violence in the lesson content?
What is the name of the shelters provided for domestic violence victims in Timor-Leste?
Which organization provides psychosocial support for domestic violence victims in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of family planning?
choices: To control the number and spacing of children
To discourage the use of contraceptives
questions.answer: To control the number and spacing of children

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as an available family planning method in Timor-Leste?
What is the main cultural preference for childbirth assistance in rural areas of Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key strategy for improving women's health in Timor-Leste?
choices: Expanding access to family planning services
Implementing programs to address domestic violence

questions.question: What is the recommended number of antenatal care visits during pregnancy?
Which of the following is mentioned as a potential solution for improving maternal health outcomes in Timor-Leste?
choices: Improving access to skilled birth attendants
Reducing the number of antenatal care visits
questions.answer: Improving access to skilled birth attendants

questions.question: What is the primary challenge in implementing the Law Against Domestic Violence in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key area for improving women's health and well-being in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of community health education plans in the context of women's health in Timor-Leste?
choices: To educate communities on key health issues
questions.answer: To educate communities on key health issues
